mapper.insert: /* 지역 코드 업서트 */ INSERT INTO AREA_CODE ( area_code, area_name, REG_YMD ) VALUES ( #{areaCode}, #{areaName}, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE area_name = #{areaName}, MDFCN_YMD = now();

/* 시군구 코드 업서트 */ INSERT INTO SIGUNGU_CODE ( sigungu_code, sigungu_name, area_id, REG_YMD ) VALUES ( #{sigunguCode}, #{sigunguName}, ( SELECT AREA_CODE.area_code FROM AREA_CODE WHERE AREA_CODE.area_code = #{areaCode} ), now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sigungu_name = #{sigunguName}, MDFCN_YMD = now();

/* TOUR API 의 여행지 정보 삽입 */ INSERT INTO TOUR_INFO_FROM_API ( destination_first_address, destination_second_address, area_code, destination_content_id, destination_content_type_id, destination_first_image_link, destination_second_image_link, destination_longitude, destination_latitude, sigungu_code, destination_title, destination_tel_num, destination_zipcode, REG_YMD ) VALUES ( #{destinationFirstAddress}, #{destinationSecondAddress}, #{areaCode}, #{destinationContentId}, #{destinationContentTypeId}, #{destinationFirstImageLink}, #{destinationSecondImageLink}, #{destinationLongitude}, #{destinationLatitude}, #{sigunguCode}, #{destinationTitle}, #{destinationTelNum}, #{destinationZipcode}, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE destination_first_address = VALUES(destination_first_address), destination_second_address = VALUES(destination_second_address), area_code = VALUES(area_code), destination_content_type_id = VALUES(destination_content_type_id), destination_first_image_link = VALUES(destination_first_image_link), destination_second_image_link = VALUES(destination_second_image_link), destination_longitude = VALUES(destination_longitude), destination_latitude = VALUES(destination_latitude), sigungu_code = VALUES(sigungu_code), destination_title = VALUES(destination_title), destination_tel_num = VALUES(destination_tel_num), destination_zipcode = VALUES(destination_zipcode)
